law.catch_line: If an applicant qualifies for a license under Part III of this subtitle, the Board shall send the ap...

text.section:
If an applicant qualifies for a license under Part III of this subtitle, the Board shall send the applicant a notice that states:
the applicant has qualified for a license; and
on receipt of a license fee set by the Board, the Board shall issue a license to the applicant.
On payment of the license fee, the Board shall issue a license to each applicant who meets the requirements of Part III of this subtitle.
